Common Setup¶

This section describes the steps that are common and necessary for using the java client library.

Setup the api key¶

All canoris requests require an api key as an http parameter.

To setup the API key we simply get an instance of the CanorisAPI object and set the key.

CanorisAPI.getInstance().setApiKey("<api_key>");

This should be the first step when using the library

Setup the base URL¶

The base URL has the default value of api.canoris.com which should be sufficient. It is possible to use another base URL in case this one changes or for testing purpose.

To set the base URL:

CanorisAPI.getInstance().setBaseURL("<base_URL>");

Setup Proxy¶

You can use a proxy if needed. To setup the proxy use the following code.

CanorisResourceManager.configProxy("example.proxy.com", 8080, "http");
CanorisResourceManager.setUseProxy(true);
